string.value: The guardian of Snow Mountain, #b#p2030000##k told me that if I want to break the ancient ice stone, I would have to go see #b#p2020000##k to make a hammer strong enough.

Bogen said that although he's not sure if it will break the ancient magic, it's worth a try and asked me to get him the ingredients to make the hammer. #b#p2020000##k. The Ingredients are #b#t04000150#, #t4011005# and #t4011007##k.
#i4000150##t4000150# #b#c4000150#/30#k
#i4011005##t4011005# #b#c4011005#/2#k
#i4011007##t4011007# #b#c4011007#/1
With #b#p2020000##k's I got the hammer that will break the ice stone. Alright, let's go to see Jeff. I'm excited!
I'm #b#p2020000##k, the best blacksmith around. If I can't make the thing you want, nobody else can! So, do you want anything?

The hammer to break the ancient snow stone? Do you mean the snow stone in the snow mountain? I wanted to make a hammer that can break the snow stone for a long time now. But I couldn't make that kind of hammer with normal components. I need special ingredients.
You have to gather all the components for the hammer. And I'll make it for you. If we work together, we can conquer the rock! Are you ready?
Great! Gather #b30 #t4000150# , 2 #t04011005# , 1 #t04011007##k. Then I can make the hammer!
If you can't get all the components, I can't make it!
Excellent! I can make it now. I have made hundreds of hammers. The most important things are the base components!
I don't know why you want to break the ancient ice stone. Good luck! I made the best Orihalcon hammer for you. Are you going to see the Ancient Ice Stone now?
Hey, I lack ingredients! I'll need #b30 #t4000150#, 2#t04011005#, 1#t04011007##k. If I don't have all of them, I can't make it. Get all of them!
What? Did you lose #b#t4031450##k? How can you lose it? It's so heavy. I have a spare hammer. I was going break the ancient ice stone later myself if you didn't! Take it with you .
